game.name: Faro
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Faro is an immersive visual novel set on a sunless planet. Everyone tries their best to survive in these barren lands. Make your choices as you set forth into this unforgiving world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Faro is an immersive visual novel set on a sunless planet. Everyone tries their best to survive in these barren lands. Make your choices as you set forth into this unforgiving world.
